name: Credit Card
description: Now comes the Visa Debit Card from City Bank. Your life, therefore, becomes hassle-free and safe; and it is Visa Electron branded, which makes you the proud owner of a meaningful plastic.
features: More convenient and safer than checks
eligibilities: Top Up: Allowable after 3 months (Minimum BDT 1 Lac)
